ComicInfo.Summary: An ages long civil war is tearing apart the Vampire Nation. The strife has divided the nation into two parties - the Vampire Nation, led by the hated Prince Drakken, and the Vampirium, led by Dominus. Recently the Vampirium has seized the upper hand in the struggle, resulting in Dominus looking to rid the Vampire Nation of impurities by commencing ethnic cleansing. Not all in the Vampirium support his cause, most notably, his children, the BloodQueen and Jonnhy Savoy, wish to stop his plan - fearing that if he is successful, he will become all-powerfull.
ComicInfo.Title: Revelations
